long_description: The Timbuk2 Tandem panniers are saddlebag style and made from a waterproof, fabric-backed tarpaulin material for high durability. Built-in magnets hold the panniers together and create a slim profile when off the bike; D-rings allow you to attach included shoulder strap. Low-profile internal stretch pocket fits most 15 in. laptops. Top flaps stay put with both rip-and-stick attachments and quick-release buckles; panniers have carry handles. Easy on/off attachment hooks tuck away when not in use.
short_description: The Timbuk2 Tandem panniers are saddlebag style and made from a waterproof, fabric-backed tarpaulin material for high durability.
